meanings.definition: A quicker or more direct way to reach a destination or achieve a goal.
meanings.sent1: Taking shortcuts through the park saved time on our walk.
meanings.sent2: She always looks for shortcuts when driving to avoid traffic.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel found a shortcut up the tree by using a hidden branch.
meanings.sent4: In life, shortcuts may lead to unexpected adventures.
meanings.sent5: His shortcut to success involved hard work and determination.

meanings.definition: A key or combination of keys on a computer keyboard that provides quick access to a specific function or program.
meanings.sent1: I use shortcuts on my keyboard to copy and paste text quickly.
meanings.sent2: Learning keyboard shortcuts can greatly improve your efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The shortcut for 'undo' saved me from a big mistake.
meanings.sent4: She pressed the shortcut keys to save the document in seconds.
meanings.sent5: Remembering all the shortcuts can make using a computer much easier.
